Voted 2022 Best Lodging In Summit County, Colorado!


Photo courtesy: Venture Photo

MORE THAN A PLACE TO STAY

MORE THAN A
PLACE TO STAY

Consider us your launch pad for all of the great adventures that the Rocky Mountains hold. We’ve partnered with these local organizations to help you elevate those experiences.

We are ecstatic and humbled to partner with The Legend. We admire not just who they are and their values, but what they’re doing and how they’re doing it in an intentional, sustainable, ethical way.

Enjoy a high-alpine mountain experience at Arapahoe Basin; open for daily summer operations June 24 – September 5, 2022.

Summer at A-Basin is off the beaten path and at a higher elevation than anywhere else in the area. When you think of an authentic Colorado Rocky Mountain experience, this peaceful, natural, and rugged place is what you’re imagining. You’re invited to explore A-Basin’s high-alpine adventures, including restaurant dining, a guided via ferrata, aerial adventure park, free hiking and biking trails, scenic chairlift rides, a 20-hole disc golf course, outdoor guided yoga, and special events.

There is something for everyone to escape the heat, the crowds, and the ordinary. It’s only a 25-minute drive from The Pad. Just remember to book summer activities online in advance.

EXPERIENCE NOT WINTER

Spring is in the air, and there is no better time to head outside to Summit County’s high country. A change to spring weather brings a change to spring activities, and a great opportunity to explore new places and sharpen skills. Use promo code “THEPAD15” and save 15% with our friends at Colorado Adventure Guides and Colorado Rafting Company to make this spring in Summit County like no other!

  • Corn Harvest – Take your spring skiing and splitboarding to new heights through late May
  • The River Calls  – Rafting trips and stand up paddle board courses starting May 1st
  • Get Wheeling – Mountain bike rides and courses to take your biking to the next level starting May 15th
BOOK YOUR ADVENTURE

An inbounds backcountry ski area designed for learning and adventure in Kremmling, Colorado, Bluebird Backcountry combines the best elements of ski areas, guide services, and the true backcountry. People love Bluebird for its great ski-patrolled terrain, backcountry rentals and lessons, lodge and warming hut — and most of all their super welcoming vibe.

Bluebird Backcountry has zero chairlifts. Instead, skiers and snowboarders make their way uphill under their own power following pre-set skin tracks. Instructors and guides are on hand for backcountry and avalanche education. And then there’s the fun part: ripping skins and skiing or riding back to the base.

Book with code BBPADLIFE and receive $5 off day passes!

SKI THE BACKCOUNTRY

Have you ever wished you could capture your adventure like a pro? Whether it’s hiking, biking, skiing, paragliding, or whatever you came to do, let’s get you in front of the camera while Venture captures your memories. With Venture you will get a professional adventure/sports photographer tagging along to get photos that you have always envisioned having while you enjoy the moment. It’s time to get out there.

BOOK CONSULT

The Colorado Mountain Club is the Rocky Mountain community for mountaincraft education, adventure, and conservation. Through peer-to peer-education, we help each other to develop the skills we need to access the backcountry safely and share life-changing adventures. We believe our children should inherit pristine wilderness and a stable climate with clean air and water. We come together to share our love of the mountains.

LEARN MORE

Whether your goal of vacation is more relaxation based, or you’ve just kicked your own butt in the mountains & need some reprieve, Intuitive Healing by Claire has the tools and experience necessary to get you feeling good. Offering a wide variety of options, from traditional massage to ashiatsu,yoga to customized stretch sessions and more, Claire provides healing via in-room options at The Pad, or a spa experience at her studio in Frisco.

LEARN MORE
